alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist County through 645 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trenton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton and other rural areas of southeast Gilchrist County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
